name: bungie-api-ts
description: TypeScript mappings for the Bungie.net API

scripts.start: rm -rf ./generated-src && mkdir -p generated-src && cp generator/http.d.ts generated-src && tsc -p tsconfig.json && node ./build/generate.js && rm -rf ./lib && mkdir -p lib && tsc -p tsconfig-commonjs.json
scripts.install: git submodule init && git submodule update

author: Ben Hollis
